GigsMap.name: David Bowie Tribute Night

facebookEvent.name: Facebook Event - David Bowie Tribute Night

GigsMap.description: 'Ground control to Major Tom', you're not gonna wanna miss this live band tribute to one of the most celebrated and unique artists of all time. The Young Americans perform an entire night's worth of Bowie's hits and highly requested fan-favorites. Let's Dance!

GigsMap.name: Turn and Face the Strange - Bowie Night

facebookEvent.name: Facebook Event - Turn and Face the Strange - Bowie Night

GigsMap.description: The Young Americans are back with a full night of Bowie hits and deep cuts. Ch-ch-change into your favorite glam rock outfit, let the children boogie and everything will be hunky dory.

GigsMap.name: Bowie Night at the Jetty

facebookEvent.name: Facebook Event - Bowie Night at the Jetty

GigsMap.description: The Young Americans return for a full night of Bowie hits and fan-favorites. Let's Dance! Under the Moonlight – the Serious Moonlight.

GigsMap.name: Ground Control to Major Tom - Bowie Night

facebookEvent.name: Ground Control to Major Tom - Bowie Night

GigsMap.description: Put on your red shoes and drink some brews. David Bowie Tribute Band “The Young Americans” play all the hits and a mix of fan favorites. Let’s Dance!

GigsMap.name: Is There Life on Mars? - Bowie Tribute with The Young Americans

facebookEvent.name: Is There Life on Mars? - Bowie Tribute with The Young Americans

GigsMap.description: The Young Americans - David Bowie Tribute Band perform a late night tribute to Mr. Hunky Dory himself, David Bowie. Right after the Flower Power Hippie Hour, get ready to freak out in a Moonage Daydream.
